column.name: Invoice
column.comment: The invoice number

column.name: Weight
column.comment: The weight of the package in Lbs

column.name: NumItems
column.comment: The number of items in the package

column.name: ShipMethod
column.comment: Hot the package will be shipped

column.name: TrackingNumber
column.comment: Number used to track the package with the vendor

column.name: SpecialInst
column.comment: Any special instructions to ship the package

column.name: sourceWH
column.comment: Where the package is being shipped from

column.name: Destname
column.comment: The name of the person who the package is being shipped to

column.name: DestAddress
column.comment: The address the package is being sent to

column.name: DestPhone
column.comment: The phone number of the person who is getting the package

column.name: GiftWrap
column.comment: True if the package should be gift wrapped

column.name: Fragile
column.comment: True if the package is fragile

column.name: Invoice
column.comment: The package invoice number

column.name: StatusID
column.comment: What the current status of the package is

column.name: OrderDate
column.comment: The date the package was ordered

column.name: ShipDate
column.comment: The date the package was shipped

column.name: ArrivalDate
column.comment: When the package arrived

column.name: Paid
column.comment: If the package has been paid for(like for COD's)

column.name: StatusID
column.comment: The status ID

column.name: StatusDesc
column.comment: A description of what the status ID means

column.name: name
column.comment: The name of the shipping company

column.name: URL
column.comment: The web site of the shipping company

column.name: Phone
column.comment: The phone number of the shipping company

column.name: LocalAddress
column.comment: The local address of the shipping company

column.name: Vendor
column.comment: The shipping vendor

column.name: ShippingMethod
column.comment: The name of the shipping method

column.name: MaxWeight
column.comment: The max weight of the package for this method

column.name: MaxItems
column.comment: The max items for this shipping method

column.name: BasePrice
column.comment: The base cost of this shipping method

column.name: PricePerLb
column.comment: Additional price per pount

column.name: PricePerItem
column.comment: Additional price per item

column.name: MaxTime
column.comment: Largest amount of time in days to ship

column.name: Location
column.comment: A location

column.name: Vendor
column.comment: The vendor name
